column4: Is there anyway to disable compiz but keep the sadows..? with compiz I really get sometimes weir behaivours with the text in the windows (it get screwd up while scrolling)
Not really, no.
so it is only possible to have shadows with compiz???
Shadows in the "darken the next window under" sense requires compositing, which is what compiz does.. it's not really compiz' fault, as the problems are due to DRI1 being over-extended
Lots of other window managers bake shadows into the window decorations, but those just look the same regardless of other windows
One option is to wait. DRI2 will eventually fix this.
Another is to switch to an nvidia gpu, as they've hacked around the issues. Mostly.
